title: fxpesa by egm securities
quickVerdict: fxpesa, powered by EGM Securities, offers a robust trading platform with a focus on accessibility and user-friendly features. Ideal for both new and experienced traders, it combines competitive spreads with reliable customer support, making it a solid choice for those seeking a dependable trading experience in the forex market.
description: fxpesa was the first cma regulated forex broker in kenya
author: 683da6c82057c3b68d8e7d45

pros.pro: Regulated by the Capital Markets Authority of Kenya
Offers a variety of account types to suit different trading needs
Provides access to popular trading platforms like MetaTrader 4
Competitive spreads and no commission on some account types
Local customer support available in Kenya
Easy account funding options, including mobile money services

cons.con: Limited to clients in specific regions, primarily focusing on Kenya
Educational resources could be more comprehensive
Limited range of tradable instruments compared to global brokers
Withdrawal fees may apply depending on the method used
